# golinks Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "golinks" {
  token = var.golinks_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String, Sensitive) API Token for authenticating with the GoLinks API.
